TextView.android:text:
After pressing the three buttons on the menu, the menu opens and there are 10 options to press:
1. When clicking on Main page- stay on this page, the entire page.
2. When clicking on Search, it opens a page where you can choose genre, after choosing and pressing SUBMIT, a movie page is open where there are movie genres, movie names, and movie trailers, also a switch, by pressing it, the movie saves and adds to My Saves and after pressing again the movie is removed from My Saves.
3. When clicking on MINI- Games, it opens a page with 4 questions, after clicking on one of the questions, the question page opens, and for discovering the answer click on the button PRESS TO FIND OUT, clicking again will show another answer saving in the app.
5. When clicking on My Saves, it opens a page where are movies name and pictures of the movie, after clicking on the movie's name or the movie's pictures, a movie page is opened and there are movie genre, movie name, and movie's trailer, there is also a switch, by pressing it, the movie saves and added to My Saves and after pressing it again the movie is removed from My Saves.
6. When clicking on Music, it opens a page where you can play and pause the music in the app, that will continue working while you venture to other pages.
7. When clicking on Instructions, it opens this page, where there are instructions for the app.
8. When clicking on About the app, it opens a page that summed up about the app and the button Connect Us, after clicking this button, open up Gmail with a massage for the Email of the programmer.
9. When clicking on Logout, it will show the confirmation to reset the password and open the sign in page after clicking confirm.
10. When clicking on Exit, it will show the confirmation to close the app after clicking confirm.
